text: Antonio Nirta (22 April 1919 - 1 September 2015) was an Italian criminal. He was the boss of the 'Ndrangheta, a Mafia-type organization in Calabria. He was born in San Luca, and, together with his brothers Giuseppe, Francesco and Sebastiano, ruled the comune. Nirta died on 1 September 2015 in Benestare, Province of Reggio Calabria. He was 96. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian mobsters Category:People from Calabria
title: Antonio Nirta
